channel.title: Demolitionx 711
channel.description:
Hey guys i'm going to try again at this development team:
Hey mopar! So some people called Forge Of Empires stole my last idea and apparently copy righted it.... So I'm back into rsps! I will be creating a server that is 667 loading the most recent cache released to the people. Currently 711. I am basing this server off of Optimus Scape 711. Please do not flame and or call me a leecher because I am not releasing this into beta till I edit and improve the server greatly. This post will be edited by a friend I have appointed to release all development and advertisement posts. Thank you.
So basically I am looking for one more coder to help me perfect this server and help it grow and be famous! Here is format for developer/coder position. [code]Name: Years In Java: Current project(s): Age: Other Important Information: [/code]
I am currently the only developer/coder of the server, I have another experienced memeber named Aiden on the team who will be doing vps and website work. Here is our update log below.
4/20/2012 Fixed Castle Wars flag glitch on stairs. Fixed pk reward shop-Takes tokens as currency.
4/21/2012 Set up vps. Aquired new forum/website.
4/26/2012 Added commands ::edge, ::home, and ::train. Added training zone with rock crabs and banks. Recruited 19 people.
4/26/2012 Added thieving with objects and area. Added slayer with monsters and rewards. (Masters too) Removed spawning. Fixed items on death. Added pk gear shop at edgeville. Removed master.
[size=12pt][b][u]Supporters[/u][/b][/size] -ME -devenb123 -Kronixz -Sandman2866 - -
Videos [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OP5ouwcyRdw&feature=youtu.be[/youtube] [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lPPQ6_5BtNk[/youtube] [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0Duupg57qs0[/youtube] [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DvcMmjwkBaU[/youtube] [youtube]http://youtu.be/oybNc7VV42w[/youtube] [youtube]http://youtu.be/bhszdRElc1g[/youtube] [youtube]http://youtu.be/Z2gPh6k0SZc[/youtube]
[img]http://i1087.photobucket.com/albums/j478/mjbtjb/demolitionXbanner.png[/img]

item.description:
@panic_veracs wrote:

Hey dude, I have a 667 server and it has no spawning in it. I would like to know how to add spawning in it?
If you can give me the codes and everything that would be great.
Thanks
